noun.description: A small truck with an enclosed cab and open back.
An act of collecting a person or goods, especially in a vehicle.
examples: travel by bus from your local pickup point to your hotel

noun.description: A casual encounter with someone, with a view to having sexual intercourse.
An improvement in an economic indicator.
examples: signs of a pickup in demand

noun.description: A device that produces an electrical signal in response to some other kind of signal or change.
The reception of signals, especially interference or noise, by electrical apparatus.
A series of introductory notes leading into the opening part of a tune.
A semicircular loop of metal for guiding the line back on to the spool as it is reeled in.

examples: six players had started a full-court pickup basketball game
